text: akasagalalli hagu bhumiyalli iruvudellavu yarige seriddendu (janarodane) keliri (mattu) heliri; allahanige seride. Avanu tanna mele karuneyannu kaddayagolisiruttane. Avanu punarut'thana dina nim'mellarannu serisuvanembudaralli sandehavilla. Svatah tam'mannu nastakkolapadisikondavaru (satyavannu) nambalararu
